alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:02PM EDT until September 08 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sullivan County in central New York... Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 502 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pecks Pond, or 14 miles west of Montague, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Shohola, Milford, Eldred, Glen Spey, Greeley, Pecks Pond, Highland Lake, and Millrift. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
